Included Features:
•••••••••••••••••

All Shared Web Hosting package comes with an industry leading set of features and services. These are all powered by the latest Intel Xeon CPUs, DDR4 memory and pure SSD storage for high performance.

Free domain name
Get a free domain name with the following extensions: .tk,.cf,.ga,.gq and .ml

CloudLinux operating system
CloudLinux is a linux based operating system which is essentially a set of kernel modifications to the Linux distribution that isolate users so that problems with one account don’t degrade the service for others.

Stepad website builder
Build professional websites with Sitepad, using an easy to use editor with several responsive themes which cover a wide range of categories like Blog, Business and many more.

cPanel control panel
cPanel is the industry’s most reliable and intuitive Linux website control panel. It allows you to manage every aspect of your site easily, without very little hassle.

Softaculous installer
Softaculous is the leading Auto Installer having 370 great scripts and 1115 PHP Classes. It offer hundreds of software like WordPress, Joomla or Drupal ready for you to install, free of charge.

Include JetBackup
JetBackup is a self restore GUI for cPanel users! Full account restore, singe file restore, download files/backups, restore emails, databases, cron jobs, SSL Certificates and more!

DDoS Protection
Free DDOS protection on all shared web hosting packages! We offer protection for bandwidth and packet intensive attacks designed to take your website offline by flooding it with more traffic than it can handle. We use multiple layers of identification and filtering hardware and services to help ensure your website remains online during these DDoS attacks. Types of attacks covered are UDP Floods, NTP Amplification, DNS Amplification, Syn Flood, Volume Based Attacks and Fragmented Packet Attacks.

Cloudflare plugin
Cloudflare is a service that provides shared web hosting performance and security enhancements, free of charge. This tool is available straight from cPanel.

99.9% uptime guarantee (cloud technology)
We guarantee that your website will be up and running 99.9% of the time.

Free website migration
If you have a website currently hosted with cPanel elsewhere, we can transfer it for you.

Free SSL certificates

Latest MariaDB 10.1

phpMyAdmin & Cron Jobs

Email server (POP/IMAP/SMTP)

24/7 Support via ticket system

About us
••••••••

At our beginning in 2012, our core business was the hosting of teamspeak servers for online gamers and the hosting of their team’s website. Since 2015, we have expanded our shared hosting activities to the general public. We have also gained experience in dedicated servers through our activities in the hosting of teamspeak servers then we have also extended our sector of activity in the VPS hosting.

Dedicated to price-quality ratio, our mission is to provide the same quality as the big leading providers in the web hosting industry and we ensures that you pay less for the highest quality. It is important to run our business as a hobby and more for enjoyment than for profits.

It is really important for us that our clients do not feel as if they are just a number. We make no false advertising or false promises. We work hard to bring the best to our clients as a small business. All comments and feedback are welcome, we will use it to evaluate changes and make improvements to our services.

Goldenbeaverhosting.com is a canadian business in sherbrooke, qc.
